page.title: 11Halesworth Middle School
page.content: Halesworth Middle School was opened in 1958 as a Secondry Modern School,it became a Middle School in 1968,the present head is Mr.Brian Bugg.There are now approx 380 pupils and 20 teachers in the school giving an average of 30 children per class,with exceptions to small year groups.There is 1 video,6 computers and 2 colour T.V.s.There is a hall which is used for assemblys and P.E.It also has a stage for school plays.There is a large library and also 2 smaller libraries.On the largest field they have a 400m running track,2 long jump pits,2 high jump pits,2 rounders pitches,a number of discus, javelin and shot areas,8 tennis courts,football,cricket,rugby and hockey pitches.On the premises we have a youth club where some school activities are held.Nearby is an open- air swimming pool used by the school
